channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.description: There have been many new and innovative products launched this year. Here are 10 that you may have missed that may appeal to anyone who loves a great ...

item.title: Medical Experts Warn About CDC’s ‘Disproven’ Autism-Vaccine Messaging
item.description: Medical experts say the CDC “is promoting the outdated, disproven idea that vaccines cause autism" and advise parents to consult clinicians for fact-b...

item.title: A Chinese ice cream chain, powered by super-cheap cones, now has more outlets than McDonald’s
item.description: Chilled drinks and cool prices are helping Mixue take over the booming sweet treat market.

item.title: Video games can teach designers deeper lessons than ‘high score streaks’ and gamification
item.description: Game design holds important lessons for education, said Lee Schuneman, the chief product officer at edtech firm Efekta Education Group.

item.title: New York’s Algorithmic Pricing Law: What It Does And Why It Matters
item.description: New York’s new algorithmic pricing law forces disclosure when personal data is used to set prices. Here’s what it requires and why it matters more tha...

item.title: Trump’s pick for chairman isn’t enough to threaten Fed independence, says Bank of America—especially if Jerome Powell decides to stick around
item.description: "The question then becomes, will Powell leave as a governor?"

item.title: Michael Dell, who’s donating $6.25 billion to ‘Trump Accounts’ for kids, says a childhood savings account changed his life
item.description: Also: All the news and watercooler chat from Fortune.

item.title: Binance names cofounder Yi He as new co-CEO
item.description: Yi He has worked in crypto since the early days of the industry, and becomes one of only a handful of women to lead a crypto firm.

item.title: Uber Launches Robotaxi Service In Dallas With Waymo Rival Avride

item.title: Some Social Security recipients to receive 2 monthly benefit checks in December
item.description: SSI recipients will receive two Social Security payments in December 2025 due to a calendar scheduling quirk that moves January's payment to Dec. 31.

item.title: Why Marvell’s stock is soaring toward its best day in months after earnings
Musk says AI and robotics are 'only' things that can solve massive US debt crisis
item.description: Elon Musk claims AI and robotics are the only solution to America's $38 trillion debt crisis, predicting dramatic economic changes within three years.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
